name: RB/CB
description:
RB/CB is an arcade top-down action game. You control a genetically engineered monster, who broke free and now craves blood. The humans are on their way to put you back into your cell... They have no idea what's coming for them. You are able to poison your prey, rewiring their mind, making them fight on your side. 

How long will your carnage last?

This game was made in 72 hours for Mini Jam 129: Poison.

Game by TheJohnyFeeD. Music by Karl Casey @ White Bat Audio.

Controls:

  • WASD - Movement
  • Read in-game tutorial for the use of abilities.
  • LMB - Bite
  • RMB - Projectile
  • Spacebar - Explosion
  • Shift - Dash

WARNING!

This game contains flashing lights,  as well as depiction of violence, blood and gore.
